image.alt: Patients and team smiling at Dopazo Orthodontics in Jacksonville

paragraphs.text: Here at Dopazo Orthodontics, we have worked hard to become recognized as one of the best Jacksonville orthodontic offices. Dr. Leandra Dopazo and our team are especially interested in making all our patients feel right at home.

We put your needs first to achieve efficient, comprehensive treatment in a supportive, nurturing environment. With braces for all ages, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> for teens and adults, and Damon™ Smile self‑ligating braces, we’ll help you get the smile you want with care personalized to you.
Schedule a complimentary initial consultation at our Jacksonville office today.

items.title: Experienced Care

image.alt: Experienced orthodontic team providing patient care

items.text: Dr. Leandra Dopazo is a board‑trained orthodontist with advanced training, delivering personalized, high‑quality care for children, teens, and adults.

items.title: Advanced Technology

image.alt: Digital scanner and modern orthodontic technology

items.text: We use tools like the iTero® digital scanner and 3D treatment planning to improve comfort, precision, and predictability for aligner and braces treatment.

items.title: Faster & Comfortable
items.text: Options like Damon™ Smile self‑ligating braces and ceramic brackets can offer more efficient tooth movement and easier hygiene during treatment.

items.title: Patient‑First Office

image.alt: Friendly staff helping patients with scheduling

items.text: We create a welcoming, family atmosphere with efficient scheduling and flexible options so visits are convenient and stress‑free.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Leandra Dopazo combines skillful artistry with progressive orthodontic techniques for children, teens, and adults. She earned her dental degree and a master’s/certificate in orthodontics from the University of Florida and has practiced orthodontics for nearly two decades, including serving as clinical faculty at the University of Florida.

Dr. Dopazo uses modern tools like the iTero® digital scanner and is an experienced Invisalign<sup>®</sup> provider. She is committed to personalized care and building lasting relationships with patients and families in Jacksonville.

image.alt: Dr. Leandra Dopazo, orthodontist at Dopazo Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We offer a full range of orthodontic services, from clear aligners to braces and growth‑phase appliances, tailored to each patient’s needs.

og_meta.title: Dopazo Orthodontics — Jacksonville Orthodontist
og_meta.description: Personalized orthodontic care in Jacksonville, FL from Dr. Leandra Dopazo. Braces, Invisalign®, Damon™, appliances, and surgical coordination.

image.alt: Orthodontic team smiling together in a bright office lobby

paragraphs.text: When you choose Dopazo Orthodontics, you are welcomed into our family. Our care is personalized to meet your needs and our practice is designed to give you comfort. Come see why our practice, our doctor, and our treatments have earned such a great reputation — schedule a complimentary initial consultation at our Jacksonville office today.

Our greatest goal is to give you the healthy, straight, and beautiful smile you’ve always wanted. We utilize the latest technology and offer a variety of safe and gentle treatment options to give you the customized, individual care you deserve.
Every smile starts with an initial consultation where we create a customized treatment plan and explain options, timing, and costs.

We focus on delivering comfortable, accessible orthodontic care for children, teens, and adults, combining modern tools and a warm, family-centered approach so patients leave confident to share their smiles.

image.alt: Dr. Leandra Dopazo smiling in her Jacksonville orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Leandra Dopazo, D.D.S., M.S., brings more than 15 years of clinical experience and a passion for orthodontics to the Jacksonville community. Inspired by the importance of building lasting relationships with patients, she and her team create a welcoming, fun atmosphere where patients feel like family from the moment they arrive.
Dr. Dopazo is committed to delivering excellent patient care with a focus on comfort, clear communication, and predictable results tailored to each patient's needs.

Dr. Dopazo earned her Doctorate of Dental Surgery in Brazil in 1997, graduating at the top of her class. She completed her Master of Science degree and Certificate in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics at the University of Florida Orthodontic Residency Program.
She has also served on faculty as a Clinical Assistant Professor at the University of Florida Orthodontic Department, contributing to clinical training of future orthodontists.

Outside the office Dr. Dopazo is married to Abe and they have two children, Lucca and Enzo. She enjoys family time, beach trips, cooking, and travel, and is active with the Rotary Club of South Jacksonville.
Dr. Dopazo blends clinical expertise with community involvement, and she looks forward to helping families in Jacksonville achieve healthy, confident smiles.

Dr. Dopazo and the Dopazo Orthodontics team stay active in the Jacksonville community. Dr. Dopazo participates with the Rotary Club of South Jacksonville and has held leadership roles in organized dentistry, contributing to local professional and service organizations.
The practice maintains a visible local presence through social channels and community posts, sharing staff highlights and neighborhood events to stay connected with patients and families.

image.alt: Graphic representing community support and outreach

og_meta.description: Meet Dr. Leandra Dopazo and the Dopazo Orthodontics team. We deliver modern, compassionate orthodontic care for children, teens, and adults in Jacksonville.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Every smile starts with an initial consultation. This visit gives you the chance to meet our team, learn about orthodontic options, and receive a complete exam so we can determine whether treatment is needed.

During your consultation we will review your dental and medical history, take X-rays and perform a full oral exam, help create a customized treatment plan, and discuss financing, insurance, and payment options so you leave with a clear next step.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically when possible to make your visits easier.
Flexible payment plans are available. Our treatment coordinator will review financing and insurance at your consultation to help find an option that fits your budget.
Before your appointment, please complete our patient forms so we can provide safe, personalized care. If you have trouble opening PDFs, Adobe Reader® is available for free from Adobe.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

og_meta.title: Get Started | Dopazo Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your orthodontic journey with Dopazo Orthodontics in Jacksonville. Learn what to expect, access new patient forms, and schedule a complimentary consult.

image.alt: Smiling family enjoying time together at a modern orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: Reliable and more comfortable than ever, metal braces use brackets and archwires to move teeth predictably. They remain a cost-effective choice for many children, teens, and adults.

image.alt: Traditional metal braces on smiling patient

paragraphs.text: Self-ligating systems reduce friction and often require fewer adjustments. They come in metal and ceramic options for a flexible, efficient treatment path.
Damon Smile uses a passive self-ligating design to allow teeth to move more freely, often improving comfort and reducing appointment times.
Ceramic braces blend with tooth color for a less noticeable look. They offer the strength of fixed appliances with improved aesthetics for older teens and adults.
Invisalign<sup>®</sup> uses a series of clear, removable aligners and advanced 3D planning to move teeth precisely. It's ideal for patients who want a discreet, flexible treatment option.
Because aligners are removable, brushing, flossing, and eating remain simple throughout treatment.
Orthognathic surgery corrects significant jaw differences that can't be fixed with braces alone. We coordinate closely with oral and maxillofacial surgeons to plan each case carefully.
Surgery typically requires hospital-based procedures and a recovery period; after healing, braces fine-tune the final bite and alignment.

image.alt: Orthodontic surgical consultation with patient and surgeon

paragraphs.text: A palatal expander gently widens the upper jaw to improve bite and create space for permanent teeth. Your orthodontist will guide adjustment and retention for stable results.

image.alt: Palatal expander appliance in a patient's mouth

paragraphs.text: Retention protects your investment. We offer removable and fixed retainers and will recommend the best schedule and type to keep your results long term.
Ask us about Vivera® retainers, custom-made with the same digital technology used for aligner planning.

paragraphs.text: Using Damon Smile, we don't just align the teeth; we create beautiful Damon Smiles. We take into account a number of factors when creating your treatment plan. Using Damon Smile, we're able to deliver a beautiful Damon Smile for a lifetime.
Studies have shown that treatment time with Damon Smile is typically much faster than with conventional braces. Also, far fewer appointments are required during treatment.

accordion.header: Since Damon Smile works so quickly, does that mean it is harsh or unsafe?

paragraphs.text: No. In fact, what makes Damon Smile work so quickly is its use of gentle, more biologically-sensible forces than conventional braces. The low-friction nature of the system ensures improved tooth position and improved facial harmony. Very light-weight, shape memory wires are used to gently guide your teeth to their ideal position resulting in a beautiful Damon Smile.

accordion.header: Will my teeth hurt after adjustments?

paragraphs.text: While braces of any kind may cause slight discomfort, many patients experience very little discomfort with Damon Smile braces because of the system's low-force, low-friction nature.

Not anymore! Braces are much smaller than they were just a few years ago, and new materials are now used that make them very discreet. Damon Smile braces have a particularly low profile, so you might forget you're even wearing them!
People of all ages should be proud of their smile. Adults can be treated quickly, easily, and most importantly, with a high-quality result.

accordion.header: How much does Damon Smile treatment cost?

paragraphs.text: We know that cost is a big question for anyone considering braces. Upon your initial consultation we'll be able to determine the cost for your specific treatment. Damon Smile braces are usually similar to the cost of traditional braces.

accordion.header: Does insurance cover Damon Smile treatment?

paragraphs.text: Because medical benefits differ significantly from policy to policy, you should review your policy coverage. If you have orthodontic coverage, Damon Smile braces are covered to the same extent as regular braces.
Upon your initial consultation and treatment plan we'll sit with you to determine the best financial option available.
